summary: A discontented Parisian teenager in search of a father with (Mathieu Amalric) and (Fabrizio Rongione) as his, respectively, callous and gentle alternative paternal options, and (Natacha Régnier) as his single mother.

keywords: teenager|donkey|hiding under a couch|written by director|emotionlessness
title: Le fils de Joseph
